function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper maintenance of green areas leading to the spread of contagious diseases such as vector-borne illnesses","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and public health concerns","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of green areas, implementation of pest control measures","Technologies":"Integrated pest management systems, green waste management technologies","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in the surrounding area","Owner":"Local municipality or community organization"},{"Description":"Lack of proper sanitation in urban agriculture spaces leading to contamination and spread of foodborne illnesses","Impact":"Health risks for individuals consuming the produce, potential outbreaks of foodborne diseases","Mitigation":"Implementation of hygiene and sanitation practices, regular inspection of agriculture spaces, education on safe food handling","Technologies":"Hydroponic and aquaponic systems, automated irrigation and fertilization systems","People":"Urban agriculture practitioners, consumers of the produce","Owner":"Local agriculture or health authorities"},{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation and air quality in multi-family residential buildings with green spaces leading to airborne disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory infections and airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Installation of proper ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, regular maintenance of HVAC systems","Technologies":"Air purification systems, smart HVAC systems, monitoring sensors for airborne pathogens","People":"Residents and visitors of multi-family residential buildings","Owner":"Property management companies or building owners"}]}
